The Oolong assembler Running from the command line: java COM.sootNsmoke.oolong.Oolong [-g] [-n] [file...] Options: -g generate debugging info -n automatically generate line numbers (implies -g)

autonumber
Whether or not to auto-number
debug_info
Whether or not to add debugging info
filename
The name of the source of the data (either the input name or from the .source line )
